'''2.2.10677''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}), '''2.2.10675''' ({{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}, via the {{w|Microsoft Store}}/{{W|Xbox (app)|Xbox app}}), '''2.2.10676''' ({{w|macOS}}), or '''2.2.10674''' ({{w|Linux}}), is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on February 18, 2022.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed more user launch issues, crashes & various bugs.
* Fixed the issue of "Show historical versions of Java" checkbox wasn't working.
* Fixed some Launcher issues in offline mode.
* {{bug|MCL-21096}} - Missing page after clicking "Read More" in "Log In" page.
